messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Super Plus package.
What does the Monthly Super Plus package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the Monthly Super Plus package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor Monthly Super Plus package?

The Monthly Super Plus package includes 36GB of internet (18GB usable from 1AM to 9AM), 500 on-net minutes, and 100 off-net minutes for Rs. 650 including tax. The package is valid for 30 days and can be activated by dialing *979#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Super Plus package.
How can I activate the Monthly Super Plus package?
What is the method to subscribe to the Monthly Super Plus package?
How do I get the Monthly Super Plus package?
You can activate the Monthly Super Plus package by dialing *979#. The package offers 36GB of internet, 500 on-net minutes, and 100 off-net minutes for 30 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Super Plus package.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Super Plus package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the Monthly Super Plus package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Monthly Super Plus package?
All Telenor GSM Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Super Plus package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Super Plus package.
How long is the Monthly Super Plus package valid?
What is the validity period of the Monthly Super Plus package?
For how many days does the Monthly Super Plus package remain active?
The Monthly Super Plus package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
